mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bowles's new and accurate map of North America and the West Indies : exhibiting the extent and boundaries of the United States, the British dominions, and territories possessed in that quarter by the Spaniards, the French, and other European powers ; the whole compiled and laid down from the best authorities, regulated and divided according to the preliminary Articles of Peace signed at Versailles 20th. Jany. 178
